alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:37PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact far southeastern Madison and Beaverhead county and the West Yellowstone area in southern Gallatin County through 530 PM MDT... At 432 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from near Monida pass east across the Centennial valley into the southern Gravelly Range. These cells were moving east at 25 mph and may produce strong wind gusts up to 50 mph and isolated hail up to one half inch in addition to lightning and brief rainfall. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Yellowstone, Targhee Pass, Raynolds Pass, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village and Red Rock Pass. This includes the following highways... Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 10. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
